[i]Tomefaire[/i] – As long as Morgan, Child of Grand Design is untapped, instant and sorcery spells you cast can't be countered.
[i]Swordfaire[/i] – As long as Morgan is tapped, attacking creatures you control have first strike.
[i]Battle Brilliance[/i] – Whenever you attack a player with two or more creatures, you may have target creature that player controls block this turn if able.
[i]Promoted Class[/i] – {G}{U}{B}
